channel.title: [New Role ?Unseen?] Enchantress
channel.description:
You probbably have played lot of games with lover. Lover is a role that picks someone and if one of them dies... well both die.
Now what is Enchantress? Her powers will use SOME of the mechanics of the said lover. But much more refined and usefull.
**Passives:**
Appear as magic user to The Inquisitor. ??? - Add something else if you want :slight_smile:
**Actives:**
_**Soul Link:**_ Enchant 2 players to fall in love. Saddly the abbility works only on the First target.
Description: Pick 2 targets : Primary and Secondary each night. If the primary dies, The secondary dies too. If the secondary dies, the primary is unfazed and he survives.
WEAK ALTERNATIVE:
Once per game link 2 players to fall in love and if one dies the other to die too.
(Althrough the first one looks waaay more fun and profitable in the long run. Adds really much more depth to the role)
**_Second Active : Enchant :_** ???? - Give me some help here :P
